entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve fast-path usage of Json with ASP.NET Core #81985
  • Failure to build pri-1 tests #81984
  • [API Proposal]: Expose the Linker's `KeepMetadata` parameter #81979
  • Proposed tasks to improve the OOB nuget build process in servicing branches #81974
    8.0.0
  • Using 7.0.x packages for net6.0 #81971
  • System.Text.Json incorrectly serializes Half (float16) type #81970
    Future
  • Crossgen2 asserts in JIT when compiling The JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_81739 #81963
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Implement new intrinsics in System/Numerics/Quaternion.cs #81961
    8.0.0
  • [Android] System.Net.Sockets BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived test is failing #81946
  • [HTTP/3] ReservedFrameType_Throws test fails #81944
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.DoCommand assertion failure during the repo build #81943
  • CA5392 False Positive on Some Functions Using LibraryImport #81939
    8.0.0
  • is possible to use DispatchProxy without interface? #81938
  • [API Proposal]: Remove the DefaultValueAttribute from properties that need dynamically calculated default values in WinForms controls #81937
  • Remove MS.Extensions.Logging.Console's dependency on ConfigurationBinder #81931
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add TotalPhysicalMemory and TotalVirtualMemory properties to the Environment class #79146
  • [System.Environment]::OSVersion.Version.Revision returns 0 #76823
  • IIdentity Nullable contract doesn't match expected #81966
  • [API Proposal]: Clean up System.Text.Json chaos #81968
  • Various System.Security.Cryptography libraries tests failing on the ES build machines #81967
  • Setting NullabilityInfoContextSupport=false in NativeAOT doesn't remove NullableAttribute/NullableContextAttribute ctors #77753
    8.0.0
  • System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentDictionary_Generic_Tests_string_string.NonRandomizedToRandomizedUpgrade_FunctionsCorrectly fails on extra-platforms #81945
    8.0.0
  • [6.0 & 7.0] "Access to the [hidden] path is denied" failure in Linux, Linux_musl, arm and arm64 #81391
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/COOL/rethrow/rethrow.sh #81869
  • [API Proposal]: System.Data.IAsyncDbConnection #81723
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.DoCommand assertion failure during the repo build #81959
  • Race in RuntimeTypeCache / metadata reading #81884
    8.0.0
  • .NET 5.0+ Marshal.PtrToStructure is slower 8x than netcore3.1 #45100
    Future
  • [wasm] `Perf_Vector128Of<Int64>.SquareRootBenchmark` failing with `float unrepresentable in integer range` #81900
    8.0.0
  • Create CI jobs for long running tests #10791
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Initialization constructor for collections #81834
  • Combining 'JsonDerivedType' attribute with a custom 'JsonConverter' on the derived class throws NotSupportedException on deserialization #81761
  • Optimize CheckSample #76520
    8.0.0
  • The `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingDefault` in code summary comment misleading #81881
    6.0.x
  • NativeAOT test infrastructure should mark indirect structures as Kept #80408
    8.0.0
  • CreateDump may use too much memory #72148
    8.0.0
  • createdump on AKS + Linux doesn't work correctly unless running in a shell #69380
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't instrument methods with [Intrinsic] #81983
    area-VM-coreclr
  • On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Transform IntCon(0) to VecCon(0) for WithElement case - fixes emitter assertion for crossgen2 #81981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid a few unnecessary char.ToStrings #81980
    area-System.IO
  • [6.0] Fix internal coreclr debian helix queue not found #81978
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some cleanup to prepare for Wasi.Build.Tests, and wasi workload #81977
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in another place in System.Text.Json #81976
    area-System.Text.Json
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • JIT: in minimal profiling mode, ignore impact of conditional throws #81972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Bump iOS/tvOS minimum version to 11.0, cleanup some code #81965
    area-Build-mono
  • FileStream and PipeStream code reuse for async File IO on Windows #81960
    area-System.IO
  • Handle renamed compressed .mibc files gracefully in crossgen2/dotnet-pgo #81955
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: start working on profile consistency #81936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SetThreadDpiAwareness for host error dialog #81930
    area-Host

Merged

  • Tweak coreclr test build script #81975
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Android] Disable failing System.Net.Sockets test #81948
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-android
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatches #81928
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: add option to use interlocked add for PGO edge count updates #81934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.15
  • Fix `getMethodSig` for array methods #81942
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Clean up, and consolidate `tests.wasm.targets`, `tests.wasi.targets`, and `tests.browser.targets` #81918
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [6.0] Use Ubuntu 18.04 instead of 16.04 in libraries helix-queue-setup #81962
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove extraneous output to console from our build. #81925
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix the Mono part of #81600 #81920
    area-Build-mono
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add star into link attributes #81407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix ConcurrentDictionary test by rooting members accessed via reflection #81957
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix bug introduced by preventing unwind through stack bottom #81956
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in AllocateManagedClassObject #81947
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix major performance regression in legacy struct marshalling APIs #81941
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [6.0] Use docker images without fixed version suffix #81933
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update area-owners.md #81958
    area-Meta
  • [7.0] Use docker images without fixed version suffix #81935
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Reimplement jiterpreter float-to-int conversions #81923
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Move mono.mscordbi subset off the offical build #81917
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove CPU cache contention for instrumented code #81932
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Pick some low-hanging fruit in LSRA throughput #81916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Enable two networking tests #81895
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [browser][wbt] Cache build output #81879
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Validate the Kept attribute against the presence of EEType in NativeAOT #81830
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix compiler crashes for invalid IL sequences #81940
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change the default createdump memory enumeration to the fast path #81922
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove dead code #81927
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Call SetLastError when MAPMapPEFile fails #81929
    area-PAL-coreclr

Updated

  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81805
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #81064
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81797
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [release/7.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81804
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2110676 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI: don't trigger *all* library tests on wasm-only changes #81906
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [coop][interp] Fix GC transitions for thunk invoke wrappers #81773
    area-Interop-mono
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Optimize ReplaceLineEndings #81630
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip wasm frames if just my code is enabled #81732
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code and fix CI #81611
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Parametrized macros for emitting arm64/neon opcodes #81887
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] rosly update test #81910
    NO-MERGE
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [NativeAOT] Add ability to generate library and exe entry points #81873
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • Templatize fgAddRefPred #81865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove errno check from the fallback in getexepath #81852
    area-Host, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Outdated packages are wrongly displayed for given target framework #30503
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Custom class "Windows" result to its elements cannot be recognized in .NET 8.0 #30498

Closed

  • Adding `global.json` version is causing `dotnet` to not run tool on linux #30361
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • GenAPI: correctly check that type has unbound type parameters #30516
    Area-GenAPI
  • GenAPI: don't synthesize fields for generic types #30515
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30499
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30488
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add design proposal for workload history #30486

Merged

  • GenAPI: synthesize private fields for value types #30362
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30475
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Document `Workload Clean` Design #30480
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2110333 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal/Discussion: Negation of if/while Condition #568

PullRequests

Merged

  • Minor corrections to collection-literals.md #6958

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ❓ Survey: Roslyn repo contribution experience 2023 #66823
  • Double click Inline parameter doesn't handle reserved keyword properly #66817
  • LocalStateTracking: Avoid instrumenting methods with no local variables #66814
  • Tracking issue for fixers that do not support "fix all" #66812
  • Revisit some sequence points emitted to code instrumented by local state tracing #66811
  • Cleanup some unnecessary IL instructions emitted by local state tracing instrumenter #66810
  • Implement support for arrays, collections and tuples to LocalStateTracingInstrumenter #66809
  • InvalidOperationException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindOutVariableDeclarationArgument #66806
  • Completions after type name in methods and top-level statements should also suggest method names #66803
  • editorconfig not working as expected #66801
  • Analyzers crash with auto generated sources #66800
  • When class name is passed into generic argument brackets, unwanted additional spaces are inserted #66794

Closed

  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #54813
    Backlog
  • You need to resolve types before naming suggestions for IEnumerable/collections work #36352
    Backlog
  • Recognize ElementAt in ForToForeach refactoring #36305
    Backlog
  • Additional location on CS8618 is lost with warnAsError = true #66037
    17.6
  • Code transformation results in error #32597
    Backlog
  • VB completion disappears when I use uppercase characters #37229
    Backlog
  • Test broken by recent change to target-type switch expressions`` #37210
    Backlog
  • Expose DocumentExtensions.IsGeneratedCode(Document, CancellationToken) #36796
    Backlog
  • Enable Assert in DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #36246
    Backlog
  • Nullable state isn't propagated from out parameters if the return value is stored in local #66807
  • Eating too much RAM #36426
    Backlog
  • Clean up dead code in AbstractLegacyProject_IIntellisenseBuildTarget.cs #36138
    Backlog
  • Roslyn’s function name resolver should support DkmBaseDebugMonitorId.TimeTravelTraceInterop #35317
    Backlog
  • Add Indent to format multi-line strings #34006
    Backlog
  • Tuple Declaration Hiding #36211
    Backlog
  • `this` not recommended between parens in incomplete code #36194
    Backlog
  • Cursor movement doesn't make sense when renaming #36043
    Backlog
  • Removing unused variables doesn't update the IDE #35943
    Backlog
  • [C#] No intellisense on fall-through switch when the code block following is in curly braces #35922
    Backlog
  • Add using refactoring should take AddImportPlacement setting into account #35803
    Backlog
  • Generate wrong dependency property callback function #35518
    Backlog
  • VisualStudioWorkspaceDiagnosticAnalyzerProviderService should fail gracefully #35138
    Backlog
  • Collapse section hotkey collapses entire region if method signature has newlines #35000
    Backlog
  • Create a context object to handle parameters passed in methods of AbstractCSharpCompletionProviderTests #34995
    Backlog
  • Duplicate reference when find all reference with mulit TargetFrameworks project #34745
    Backlog
  • Code fix preview fails to show diff for trailing whitespace changes #34670
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Indicate Language of a string parameter with an attribute #34640
    Backlog
  • GenerateEventCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34474
    Backlog
  • GenerateEndConstructCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34473
    Backlog
  • MoveToTopOfFileCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34471
    Backlog
  • CorrectNextControlVariableCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34470
    Backlog
  • InsertMissingCastCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34469
    Backlog
  • AbstractFullyQualifyCodeFixProvider does not support Fix All #34465
    Backlog
  • IncrementalAnalyzerProcessor.GetActiveProject returns null #34447
    Backlog
  • Find All References is broken on mixed F# and C# solution #33627
    Backlog
  • protected internal virtual Intellisense shows nothing in derrived class #33383
    Backlog
  • Add test to verify Add Imports is the only extension with priority = CodeActionPriority.High #33217
    Backlog
  • Convert tuple to struct suggestion only shows up on the single open parentheses character #33195
    Backlog
  • Cannot see all parameters in intellisense #33128
    Backlog
  • 12% of opening a document is Roslyn overhead #32669
    Backlog
  • Suggested enum not commited by square bracket #33099
    Backlog
  • Display localized string from the resource when hovering on the resource strings. #33055
    Backlog
  • #nullable offered in completion when using version of C# <8 #33027
    Backlog
  • Rename using #33002
    Backlog
  • Support additive classifications in ClassifiedSpans and TaggedText #32770
    Backlog
  • Quick Action ability to Change/Add a prefix to the field variable when adding a parameter to a constructor #32637
    Backlog
  • Use DoNotAllowVarAnnotation.Kind instead of DoNotAllowVarAnnotation.Annotation #32567
    Backlog
  • Cant see definitions #32534
    Backlog
  • "Alias ambiguous type" should show up above "Fully qualify" #30839
    Backlog
  • Completions from unimported namespaces don't respect global usings #66802
  • COM library is causing a CS0246 Error in VS 2022 #66200
    17.6
  • "Private members are unused" does not use language-syntax in error messages #30884
    Backlog
  • Is "Enforce code style on build" still an experimental feature? #66788
  • Visual Studio does not suggest <see langword=""/> for some keywords #31208
    Backlog
  • Blocker: Project.Documents.Count() returning 0 for most of C# code bases suddenly #30792
    Backlog
  • Pick better parameter names when generating a method that will be passed to Action/Func. #29761
    Backlog
  • `Convert to full property` refactoring generates colliding field names that leads to CS0542 #30208
    Backlog
  • Typing closing brace of switch expression results in duplicate brace #32373
    Backlog
  • PreviewChangesTests.TestLinkedFileChangesMergedAndDeduplicated failed #31810
    Backlog
  • NRE on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CSharpSemanticFactsService.GetGetAwaiterMethod(SemanticModel semanticModel, SyntaxNode node) #31302
    Backlog
  • Simplifying expressions interacting strangely with #if #31280
    Backlog
  • Workspace.TryApplyChanges throwing not supported exception #31074
    Backlog
  • Failed to load solution in parallel #30096
    Backlog
  • Don't get offered to generate a constructor if a property has only a getter #29198
    Backlog
  • Bad tooltip on structure guidelines in VB #30762
    Backlog
  • do not set FatalError handlers in unit tests #30572
    Backlog
  • Allow collapsing 'case' blocks for switch statements. #29998
    Backlog
  • [CSharpAsAndNullCheckDiagnosticAnalyzer] Assert fired for a switch statement local declaration statement #29854
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dot completion in cases where dots are parsed as a range operator #66822
    Area-IDE
  • Fix case where the 'default' keyword was not recommended #66821
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash in VB type name simplification #66813
    Area-IDE
  • Update 'introducing using' to support using-declaration-statements as well as using-statements #66808
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash in FAR helpers when only part of a linked-document set has been updated #66805
    Area-IDE
  • Implement legacy options provider for code actions in workspace layer #66798
    Area-IDE
  • VisualBasicPackage must be constructed on the main thread #66797
    Area-IDE
  • remove unused error reporting service impl #66793
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Expand on the set of patterns 'convert for to foreach' detects #66818
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Workaround crash in decompiler #66820
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Provide smart name suggestions, even when the type of the declaration cannot be bound #66819
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix 'use auto prop' case that could cause definite assignment errors #66804
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable assert #66816
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delete dead code #66815
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support generating a constructor from a get-only property #66789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix naming issue with 'Convert to full property' #66792
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support converting any language keyword to see-langword in xml doc comments #66796
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Produce better names when generating methods with inferred Action/Func type #66791
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix message string in 'remove private members' #66795
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66790
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow razor tests to get diagnostics #66748
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move fixer down to code-style layer #66780
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/toddgrun/request concurrency #66767
    Area-IDE
  • Parsing for role and extension type declarations #66728
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Remove unused TS brace completion code"" #66781
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Remove IDocumentOperationService.SupportsDiagnostics #34009
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • [PERF] Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46575
  • Net 6.0 Razor Pages basic nagivation problem #46572
  • Survey: Repo Contribution Experience 2023 #46571
    Discussions
  • Provide a way for ByPassing Authentication & Authorization with Server token #46569
  • Kestrel gives 401 for large file uploads via POST request #46566
  • ASP.Net Identity Blazor: How to access `ClientId` and Client's `RedirectUris` from _Host.cshtml? #46565

Closed

  • Describe Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserOptions.RequireUniqueMail behaviour in documentation comments #46435
    8.0-preview2
  • SignalR Java client: allow customisation of the Gson deserialisation process #17519
    8.0-preview2
  • Add $schema to launchSettings.json for all project templates #46416
    8.0-preview2
  • .Net 6 assembly utilizing Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.Healthchecks v 6.0.13 fails to load .Net 7 dependency. #46567
  • Perf regression: plaintext #46557
  • HTTP/3: Verify HTTP/3 works on expected platforms #46500
  • SignalR Redis Cluster scale-out: Message throughput scalability #46408

PullRequests

Created

  • StatusCodePagesMiddleware: Improving response started verification #46576
    area-runtime
  • Tweak exception message for `TryParse` method not found #46574
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
  • Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46570
    area-signalr
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Updated Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserOptions.RequireUniqueEmail flag description. #46552
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • ProjectTemplates schema launch settings #46548
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Refactor named pipes connection listener completion #46521
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Add HTTP/3 test to verify platform support #46523
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Avoid accessing RequestServices & creating a logger in Utf8ContentHttpResult if no logging is being performed #46560
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • fix typo in log message #46540
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Update to Helix 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure
  • Expose the original status code in StatusCodeReExecuteFeature #46539
    area-runtime
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • First pass at basic query string parameters. #46545
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ImageButton] VisualStateGroup crash app to break in release mode #13259
  • [Slider] MAUI Slider thumb image is big on android #13258
  • [ToolbarItem] IsEnabled property false not working #13257
  • 🙋🏽‍♀️ [Survey] GitHub contributor experience #13252
  • The template generates invalid code? MAUI targeting .net 7 in Visual Studio IDE 2022. #13248
  • ScrollView not updating size on iOS #13246
  • Loaded and Unloaded events are not fired correctly #13245
  • [Android] FlyoutWidth with OnIdiom shows no flyout #13243
  • [WinUI] FlyoutHeader displays no image (svg) #13242
  • Microsoft.Maui.FontManager: Warning: Unable to load font 'sans-serif-medium' from assets. #13239

Closed

  • MAUI FlexLayout in a Grid Row of Height Auto will throw exception #13004
    Backlog
  • Add children of custom content control after all the public API's are set #4071
  • [WinUI] Unfocused event of Entry is not fired after navigating back to the page that contains it #10459
    Backlog
  • Compile errors when adding UseMaui to WinUI desktop project #5372
    .NET 8 Planning
  • OpenAppPackageFileAsync always returns null stream on iOS simulator #7975
  • DllNotFoundException is thrown when calling a library in Android Emulator #13241
  • API Docs - reconcile code comment docs with existing forms docs #4359
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [iOS] Shell.TitleView doesn't show accurate if not using just a string binding #11309
    Backlog
  • Shell.TitleView does not render on iOS 16 #10128
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android] Shadow with clipping not working properly #11578
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [controls] fix memory leak in Style and AttachedCollection #13260
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Use and clear a local nuget cache #13256
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Fix sizing of button when using CharacterSpacing #13250
    area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • [CI] Allow to find the eng folder when multiple projects are checkedout. #13254
  • Let the Grid skip * measurements during the first pass if they'll be overwritten later #13255
  • Update Essentials SMS API Docs #12849
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Revert changes from 11721 #13253
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] [core] `WeakEventManager+Subscription` needs `IEquatable` #13249
  • [Windows] Fix issue with caching the page that holds unfocused control #13028
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Remove Compatibility packages by default #13165
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, backport/NO
  • feat: Added nullable annotations for IValueConverter. #13173
    community ✨
  • [core] `WeakEventManager+Subscription` needs `IEquatable` #13232
    t/breaking 💥, area/perf 🏎️, backport/suggested
  • Remove TargetIdiom #13090
    t/breaking 💥
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13237
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [CI] Install the android and iOS dotnet version when they are diff to the maui one. #13228
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Don't refresh the filtered tests if the filter hasn't actually changed #13236
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨
  • ItemContentControl - apply bindings once for ItemTemplate (Windows) #10999
    community ✨
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • [Proposal] Organize partial classes inside Controls #13113
    area/architecture
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Use the launcher to start the camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix Editor scrolling #13234
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Resizetizer] Do not update images if they have not been updated. #13224
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground property #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Fix crash using complex html content #11409
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
